揚.definition: to raise; to hoist; the action of tossing or winnowing; scattering (in the wind); to flutter; to propagate

揚中.definition: Yangzhong, county-level city in Zhenjiang 鎮江|镇江[Zhen4 jiang1], Jiangsu

揚中市.definition: Yangzhong, county-level city in Zhenjiang 鎮江|镇江[Zhen4 jiang1], Jiangsu

揚召.definition: to flag down (a cab) on the street; to hail (a taxicab)

揚名.definition: to become famous; to become notorious

揚子江.definition: Changjiang 長江|长江 or Yangtze River; old name for Changjiang, especially lower reaches around Yangzhou 揚州|扬州

揚州.definition: see 揚州市|扬州市[Yang2zhou1 Shi4]

揚州市.definition: Yangzhou, prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province 江蘇省|江苏省[Jiang1su1 Sheng3]

揚帆遠航.definition: to set sail on a voyage to a distant place; (fig.) to undertake a great mission

揚幡招魂.definition: lit. to raise a banner to summon the soul of a dying person (idiom); fig. to try to revive what is obsolete or dead

揚清激濁.definition: lit. drain away filth and bring in fresh water (idiom); fig. dispel evil and usher in good; eliminate vice and exalt virtue

揚科維奇.definition: Jankovic; Yankovic; Yankovich; Jelena Jankovic (1985-), Serbian tennis player

揚言.definition: to put about (a story, plan, threat etc); to let it be known (esp. of threat or malicious story); to threaten

揚起.definition: to raise one's head; to perk up

揚長.definition: with swagger; ostentatiously; to make the best use of one's strengths

揚長而去.definition: to swagger off; to walk off (or drive off etc) without a second thought for those left behind

揚長避短.definition: to foster strengths and avoid weaknesses (idiom); to play to one's strengths

揚雄.definition: Yang Xiong (53 BC-18 AD), scholar, poet and lexicographer, author of the first Chinese dialect dictionary 方言[Fang1 yan2]

揚鞭.definition: to whip on; to raise a whip; by ext. to swagger
